def_en: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it.
If someone informs on a person, they give information about the person to the police or another authority, which causes the person to be suspected or proved guilty of doing something bad.

def_cn: 赋(思想或特质)于;渗透入
def_en: If a situation or activity is informed by an idea or a quality, that idea or quality is very noticeable in it.
